page.title: 09RUNS TO CROSFIELDS
page.content: Three boys did a survey on how far pupils and teachers travel to and from Crosfields school. These are the results: 31 people live under 5 miles away. 54 people live 5 to 9 miles away. 40 people live 10 to 14 miles away. 05 people live 15 to 19 miles away. 02 people live 20 to 24 miles away. We found out in the survey that people come from far away to Crosfields school. This is because their parents think it is a good school. Quite a lot of people use runs, the parents take turns in taking a group of boys to school. Also boys use private buses which collect those boys who live far away and whose parents are not able to take their sons to and from school.
